name: Ejen2u International Sdn Bhd
description: Developer of a reseller ecosystem platform intended to help business owners manage resellers like stockists, agents, and dropships. The company's platform is integrated, digitalized, and data-driven and offers systematic product ordering, detailed reporting, commissions, reward systems, databases, and performance monitoring among others, enabling businesses to improve productivity and profitability.
one_liner: Developer of a reseller ecosystem platform intended to help business owners manage resellers like stockists, agents, and dropships. The company's platform is integrated, digitalized, and data-driven and offers systematic product ordering, detailed reporting, commissions, reward systems, databases, and performance monitoring among others, enabling businesses to improve productivity and profitability.

name: Infraspeak, LDA
description: Developer of a facility management platform designed to bring entire operations together with intelligent maintenance. The company's platform automates recurring tasks, makes everything work together, and reduces bureaucracy, risks, and costs with the help of innovative technologies, APIs, applications, and sensors to transform all data into actionable insights and suggestions, enabling facilities owners, managers, and service providers to manage facilities significantly with less stress, paper, and costs.
one_liner: Developer of a facility management platform designed to bring entire operations together with intelligent maintenance. The company's platform automates recurring tasks, makes everything work together, and reduces bureaucracy, risks, and costs with the help of innovative technologies, APIs, applications, and sensors to transform all data into actionable insights and suggestions, enabling facilities owners, managers, and service providers to manage facilities significantly with less stress, paper, and costs.

name: MentorCloud, Inc.
description: Operator of an educational online platform designed for mentoring and knowledge sharing. The company develops a cloud-based platform that helps organizations to match and engage their employees globally with suitable peers, experts, mentors, and filtered content, according to employees' goals, interests, skills, and knowledge needs, enabling human resource leaders to easily identify subject matter experts and rising stars in the organization.

name: Melian Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a SaaS based point of sale designed to automate workflow. The company's platform helps in scheduling appointments, social bookings, growth marketing, staff, and listing management along with detailed analytics reports, enabling businesses to improve sales and productivity.
one_liner: Developer of a SaaS based point of sale designed to automate workflow. The company's platform helps in scheduling appointments, social bookings, growth marketing, staff, and listing management along with detailed analytics reports, enabling businesses to improve sales and productivity.

name: NexMind AI Pte. Ltd.
description: NexLaw’s TrialPrep platform uses AI to streamline litigation and trial preparation by automating case analysis, legal research, and evidence management for litigators.
one_liner: NexLaw’s TrialPrep platform uses AI to streamline litigation and trial preparation by automating case analysis, legal research, and evidence management for litigators.

name: Omniful, Inc.
description: Developer of an operations platform designed for omnichannel retail and omnichannel management. The company's platform help retailers fulfill orders in minutes by instantly shipping online orders directly from physical retail stores and providing tools & software to help omnichannel retailers operate better, and faster, enabling brick-and-mortar retailers to operate more efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of an operations platform designed for omnichannel retail and omnichannel management. The company's platform help retailers fulfill orders in minutes by instantly shipping online orders directly from physical retail stores and providing tools & software to help omnichannel retailers operate better, and faster, enabling brick-and-mortar retailers to operate more efficiently.

name: Peddlr Inc
description: Developer of an inventory management platform designed to build a digital infrastructure for micro and small businesses in Southeast Asia. The company offers a digital infrastructure that manages sales, inventory, accounting and reports through mobile devices by working offline and without the Internet, enabling micro and small businesses to manage sales, inventory, accounting and reports through their mobile devices and manage their businesses better.
one_liner: Developer of an inventory management platform designed to build a digital infrastructure for micro and small businesses in Southeast Asia. The company offers a digital infrastructure that manages sales, inventory, accounting and reports through mobile devices by working offline and without the Internet, enabling micro and small businesses to manage sales, inventory, accounting and reports through their mobile devices and manage their businesses better.

name: Planby Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of an AI-powered interior design automation platform designed to streamline the design process. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence to create custom interior designs in less than a minute with various settings, enabling users to create designs that match their preferences while reducing unnecessary time and delivering designs quickly.
one_liner: Developer of an AI-powered interior design automation platform designed to streamline the design process. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence to create custom interior designs in less than a minute with various settings, enabling users to create designs that match their preferences while reducing unnecessary time and delivering designs quickly.

name: Qashio Holding Company Limited
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to offer a comprehensive enterprise expense management solution. The company's virtual cards combined with its software and allow expense reporting, better visibility, control of cash flows, and an empowered workforce, enabling businesses to manage their spending in a more automated and transparent way, saving hundreds of man-hours and reducing petty cash leakage in the process.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to offer a comprehensive enterprise expense management solution. The company's virtual cards combined with its software and allow expense reporting, better visibility, control of cash flows, and an empowered workforce, enabling businesses to manage their spending in a more automated and transparent way, saving hundreds of man-hours and reducing petty cash leakage in the process.

name: Incompleteness Theorem Sdn Bhd
description: Provider of space-as-a-service designed for companies of all sizes from fast-growing startups to multinational corporations. The company uses its on-demand office network to offer community-based workspaces, including community events, high-speed internet, virtual office setups, and private telephone booths, enabling members to discover opportunities while sharing experiences and benefit from the one-stop business center services.

name: Avocode, Inc.
description: Developer of a file-sharing software designed to facilitate collaboration between designers and developers. The company's software exports images without preparing layers from Photoshop and Sketch designs, including colors, image assets, fonts, text, sizes, and dimensions, enabling customers to work on the web and mobile projects efficiently.

The company's software exports images without preparing layers from Photoshop and Sketch designs, including colors, image assets, fonts, text, sizes, and dimensions, enabling customers to work on the web and mobile projects efficiently.

name: Tasytt Inc.
description: Provider of a Slackbot platform created for team collaboration and on boarding. The company's platform provides a web virtual assistant to help teams collaborate and make faster decisions, enabling them to be informed of team members and save time and effort in decision making.
